prompt: A cosmic scene showing the Eclipse Vista, a location where two planets eclipse a radiant sun. The surrounding space is filled with twinkling stars and colorful nebulae in vibrant purples, blues, and golds. Large, ancient asteroids drift near the vista, hinting at an ancient past. The light from the eclipsing sun creates an awe-inspiring halo effect, illuminating the dark silhouettes of the planets. Ethereal energy streams between the celestial bodies, creating a mystical, otherworldly atmosphere. Art style is bright and ethereal, showcasing detailed cosmic elements and blending futuristic and mystical aesthetics.
